CustomField.formula:
If ( AND( ISBLANK(HRCSVC_Case__c) ,ISBLANK( HRCSVC_Work_Order__c )), LastModifiedDate ,
If( ISBLANK( HRCSVC_Work_Order__c ), (If( LastModifiedDate >= HRCSVC_Case__r.LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedDate , HRCSVC_Case__r.LastModifiedDate)),
If( ISBLANK(HRCSVC_Case__c), (If( LastModifiedDate >= HRCSVC_Work_Order__r.LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedDate, HRCSVC_Work_Order__r.LastModifiedDate)),
If( NOT(AND( ISBLANK(HRCSVC_Case__c) ,ISBLANK( HRCSVC_Work_Order__c ))), (If ( AND(LastModifiedDate >= HRCSVC_Case__r.LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedDate >= HRCSVC_Work_Order__r.LastModifiedDate), LastModifiedDate, (If(HRCSVC_Case__r.LastModifiedDate >= HRCSVC_Work_Order__r.LastModifiedDate,HRCSVC_Case__r.LastModifiedDate, HRCSVC_Work_Order__r.LastModifiedDate )))),null))))
CustomField.label: Last Relevant Date
